comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Olivette Miller was the daughter of vaudvillian Flournoy Eakin Miller (1887-1971), and niece of producer Irvin Colloden Miller (1884-1975). She was married to dancer Freddy Gordon in the 1940s (divorce ca. 1952?), comedian Bert Gibson in the 1950s, and was called Olivette Miller Darby in the 1970s, but later went by Olivette Miller-Briggs, when she was married to tap dancer Bunny Briggs (b. 1922). Can't find a birth or death date for her, though. (She may still be alive.) www.imdb.com/name/nm0588329/ en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bunny_Briggs
